SETTINGS.NOTE: Note: Settings on this page override configurations from the Syncwerk REST API configuration file.

GENERAL.DESCRIBE_ENABLE_GLOBAL_ADDRESS_BOOK: Enable user auto complete list. Please note that this option will not affect the users who don't have the permission to use global address book.

URL.DESCRIBE_SERVICE_URL: Enter the server address with protocol. You can enter a domain name or an IP address. Make sure the domain name resolves to the external IP address of the server. Example: https://app.syncwerk.de or http://192.168.0.1
URL.DESCRIBE_FILE_SERVER_ROOT: Enter the address specified under SERVICE_URL with the addition "/seafhttp". If the address is not set correctly, you can not exchange files with the server. Example: https://app.syncwerk.de/seafhttp or http://192.168.0.1/seafhttp
URL.DESCRIBE_ALLOW_FOLDERS_IN_BATCH: Determines if it's allowed to download folder in batch download
URL.DESCRIBE_BATCH_MAX_FILES_COUNT: Determines the max number of files allowed to download at once in batch download
URL.DESCRIBE_VERIFY_ONLYOFFICE_CERTIFICATE: Determine if the only office server certificate should be verified or not (should always be true in production)
URL.DESCRIBE_ONLYOFFICE_APIJS_URL: The url of the onlyoffice service server
URL.DESCRIBE_ONLYOFFICE_FORCE_ADMIN_SETTINGS: Determines whether to force admin settings or not.
URL.DESCRIBE_ONLYOFFICE_OPEN_MODE: The default open mode for openoffice docs

USER.DESCRIBE_ALLOW_NEW_REGISTRATION: Activate the public registration. If activated, new users can register in the login area.
USER.DESCRIBE_ACTIVATE_AFTER_REGISTRATION: Activate or deactivate the immediate activation of publicly registered users. "Email Vertification" setting will be ignored if this option is activated.
USER.DESCRIBE_SEND_ACTIVATION_EMAIL: If this option is enabled, publicly registered users must activate their account via a verification link emailed to them. otherwise, the account must be activated by an administrator.
USER.DESCRIBE_KEEP_SIGN_IN: Here you can set the maximum number of days a user can be logged in to the Syncwerk web app before having to log in again.
USER.DESCRIBE_LOGIN_ATTEMP_LIMIT: Define the number of incorrect logon attempts before entering a CAPTCHA code is required.
USER.DESCRIBE_FREEZE_USER_ON_LOGIN_FAILED: Locks the account when the number of specified login attempts has been reached.

PASSWORD.DESCRIBE_STRONG_PASSWORD: Activation enforces the use of strong passwords.
PASSWORD.DESCRIBE_PASSWORD_STRENGTH_LEVEL: Determine how many character types (1-4) login passwords require. There are four types of characters: 1. numeric, 2. uppercase letters, 3. lowercase letters, 4. special characters. Depending on the entered number, any mix of these character types is required for password creation.
PASSWORD.DESCRIBE_FORCE_PASSWORD_CHANGE: When enabled this forces new user accounts or accounts for which a password reset has been performed by an administrator, to update their password.
PASSWORD.DESCRIBE_PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH: Set the minimum number of characters for a user account password.
PASSWORD.SAME_PASSWORD: New password must be different from old password.

FOLDER.DESCRIBE_FOLDER_HISTORY: When enabled, it allows users to change the settings for the versioning period of a top-level folder.
FOLDER.DESCRIBE_ENCRYPTED_FOLDER: Allows users to create encrypted top-level directories.
FOLDER.DESCRIBE_FOLDER_PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH: The minimum number of characters an encrypted top-level folder must contain.
FOLDER.DESCRIBE_DOWNLOAD_UPLOAD_LINK_PASSWORD_M: Sets the minimum length for publicly shared up or download links.
FOLDER.DESCRIBE_ENABLE_USER_CREATE_ORG_REPO: When enabled, users can share one or more of their directories globally with ALL other users on this installation. If disabled, only administrators can create such shares.
FOLDER.DESCRIBE_PREVIEW_FILE_EXTENSIONS: Set for which file types the preview is activated. Separate several file types with a comma. Example: docx, xlsx, pdf
FOLDER.PASSWORD_PROTECTED: Please enter the password for folder '{{nameFolder}}'

SYNC.DESCRIBE_DISABLE_SYNC_WITH_ANY_FOLDER: If activated, the user can sync subfolders. If deactivated, subfolders can only be synchronized through their top-level folder.

COOKIE_DISCLAIMER.SHOW_COOKIE_DISCLAIMER_DESC: Activate this option to show a cookie disclaimer on the login page

BBB.TITLE: BigBlueButton Settings
BBB.BBB_SECRET_KEY_PLACEHOLDER: (Secret key is set, but not shown for security reasons)
BBB.ALLOW_USER_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER: Allow users to add private meeting servers
BBB.ALLOW_USER_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_DESC: If enabled, users can add a custom meeting server in their profile
BBB.ALLOW_USER_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_NOTE: Notice: When disabled, existing meetings using personal settings will not be affected. Go to Administration => Meetings to remove them manually.
BBB.ALLOW_TENANTS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER: Allow tenants to add private meeting server
BBB.ALLOW_TENANTS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_DESC: If enabled, tenants can add a custom meeting server in their profile
BBB.ALLOW_TENANTS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_NOTE: Notice: When disabled, existing meetings using tenant settings will not be affected. Go to Administration => Meetings to remove them manually.
BBB.ALLOW_GROUPS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER: Allow groups to add private meeting server
BBB.ALLOW_GROUPS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_DESC: If enabled, groups can add a custom meeting server in their profile
BBB.ALLOW_GROUPS_PRIVATE_BBB_SERVER_NOTE: Notice: When disabled, existing meetings using group settings will not be affected. Go to Administration => Meetings to remove them manually.
BBB.DEFAULT_AMOUNT_OF_MEETING_DESC: The amount of meetings allowed per user. Default is 1
BBB.ALLOW_PUBLIC_SHARES_FOR_MEETING_RECORDIN: Allow public shares for meeting recordings

SHARE.TITLE: Share meeting
SHARE.LINK_TEXT: Create a public share link here and submit it to external users for joining the meeting.

SHARE.GROUP_LINK_TEXT: Use this sharing form to share the meeting to groups.

FORM.NAME: Meeting name
FORM.INPUT_OWNER_PLACEHOLDER: Email of the meeting owner. If not provided, then the current admin will be the owner.
FORM.OPTION_ALLOW_STREAMING_FEEDBACK: Enable feedback form on streaming page
FORM.OPTION_REQUIRE_PASSWORD: Require pin for publicly shared meetings
FORM.OPTION_MUTE_PARTICIPANT: Mute participants when joining a meeting
FORM.OPTION_ALLOW_START: Allow any users to start this meeting
FORM.MAX_AMOUNT: Maximum amount for participants for this meeting

PUBLIC_LINK_PAGE.AUTO_JOIN_WHEN_STARTED: You will automatically join when the meeting starts.

PUBLIC_LINK_PAGE.FULL_NAME_FORMAT_ERROR: Your full name can only contains numbers, alphabet and space
